title: Ergo Starting Bounties for Rust Devs
selftext:
The Ergo Blockchain is starting to put together bounties for Rust Devs. 

https://github.com/ergoplatform/sigma-rust/labels/bounty

Small hackathon event this week in discord for any Rust Devs interested in participating.   
Starts 09:00 UTC June 11th

[https://discord.gg/dmwEudA5](https://discord.gg/dmwEudA5)
